mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(mem_id, trv_id, brd_tt, brd_ct) VALUES (#{memId}, #{trvId}, #{brdTt}, #{brdCt})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, SUBSTR(c.trv_pc, 0, 2) trv_plc, c.trv_pc, b.brd_img brdImg1 FROM board a, board_img b, travel c WHERE a.brd_id = b.brd_id AND a.trv_id = c.trv_id AND b.brd_idx = '1'

SELECT a.*, SUBSTR(c.trv_pc, 0, 2) AS trv_plc, c.trv_pc, b.brd_img AS brdImg1 FROM board a JOIN board_img b ON a.brd_id = b.brd_id JOIN travel c ON a.trv_id = c.trv_id WHERE b.brd_idx = '1' AND (#{keyWord} IS NULL OR a.brd_tt LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%' OR c.trv_pc LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%')

SELECT a.*, SUBSTR(c.trv_pc, 0, 2) trv_plc, c.trv_pc, b.brd_img brdImg1 FROM board a, board_img b, travel c WHERE a.brd_id = b.brd_id AND a.trv_id = c.trv_id AND b.brd_idx = '1' AND a.mem_id = #{memId}

SELECT T.trv_pc, T.trv_id, T.trv_x, T.trv_y, B.brd_id, B.brd_tt, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(B.brd_ct, 4000, 1) brd_ct, MAX(CASE WHEN I.brd_idx = '1' THEN I.brd_img END) AS brd_img1, MAX(CASE WHEN I.brd_idx = '2' THEN I.brd_img END) AS brd_img2, MAX(CASE WHEN I.brd_idx = '3' THEN I.brd_img END) AS brd_img3 FROM TRAVEL T JOIN BOARD B ON T.trv_id = B.trv_id LEFT JOIN BOARD_IMG I ON B.brd_id = I.brd_id WHERE B.brd_id = #{brdId} GROUP BY T.mem_id, T.trv_id, T.trv_pc, T.trv_x, T.trv_y, B.brd_id, B.brd_tt, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(B.brd_ct, 4000, 1)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(brd_id, rpy_id, mem_id, rpy_ct) VALUES(#{brdId}, #{rpyId}, #{memId}, #{rpyCt})
mapper.select: SELECT a.rpy_id, a.brd_id, b.mem_nm, b.mem_img, a.rpy_ct, TO_CHAR(a.rpy_dt, 'MM/DD HH24:MI') rpyDt FROM reply a, member b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.rpy_id = #{rpyId}
SELECT a.rpy_id, b.mem_id, a.brd_id, b.mem_nm, b.mem_img, a.rpy_ct, TO_CHAR(a.rpy_dt, 'MM/DD HH24:MI') rpyDt FROM reply a, member b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.brd_id = #{brdId} ORDER BY rpyDt
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reply a, member b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.brd_id = #{brdId}
